Uses of Interface
javax.time.temporal.TemporalQuery

  • Packages that use TemporalQuery 
    Package Description
    javax.time
    The main API for dates, times, instants, and durations.
    javax.time.format
    Provides classes to print and parse dates and times.
    javax.time.temporal
    Access to date and time using fields and units, additional value type classes and base support for calendar systems other than the default ISO.

    • Uses of TemporalQuery in javax.time

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static TemporalQuery<Chrono<?>> Queries.chrono()
      A query for the Chrono.
      static TemporalQuery<ZoneOffset> Queries.offset()
      A query for the ZoneOffset.
      static TemporalQuery<ChronoUnit> Queries.precision()
      A query for the smallest supported unit.
      static TemporalQuery<ZoneId> Queries.zone()
      A lenient query for the ZoneId, falling back to the ZoneOffset.
      static TemporalQuery<ZoneId> Queries.zoneId()
      A strict query for the ZoneId.
